Package net.beadsproject.beads.data.audiofile

Class JavaSoundAudioFile

java.lang.Object
net.beadsproject.beads.data.audiofile.JavaSoundAudioFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
AudioFileReader, AudioFileWriter
public class JavaSoundAudioFile
extends java.lang.Object
implements AudioFileReader, AudioFileWriter
Read and write audio files using the Javasound library. Only 'one-shot' reading and writing is supported (i.e. no streaming). See AudioFileWriter and AudioFileReader.

    • writeAudioFile

      public void writeAudioFile​(float[][] data, java.lang.String filename, AudioFileType type, SampleAudioFormat saf) throws java.io.IOException, OperationUnsupportedException
      See AudioFileWriter.writeAudioFile(float[][], java.lang.String, net.beadsproject.beads.data.audiofile.AudioFileType, net.beadsproject.beads.data.SampleAudioFormat)
      Specified by:
      writeAudioFile in interface AudioFileWriter
      Parameters:
      data - - the data to be written
      filename - - the name of the file to be written
      type - - the type of audio file to be written (mp3, wav, etc.)
      saf - - a SampleAudioFormat object specifying the attributes of the sample data to be written. Can be NULL, in which case default values will be used.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      OperationUnsupportedException
